-- This file is generated from ExampleFile.ump --

 -- This defines a NuSMV module for Status --
 MODULE Status

    -- This part declares input variables for the given NuSMV module --
   IVAR
     event : { buttonOrObstacle , reachBottom , reachTop };
    
    -- This part declares state variables for the given NuSMV module --
   VAR
     state : { Open , Closing , Closed , Opening , HalfOpen };
    
    -- This part defines macros that summarize the transitions of the given NuSMV module --
   DEFINE
     t1 := event = buttonOrObstacle & state = Open;
     t2 := event = buttonOrObstacle & state = Closing;
     t3 := event = reachBottom & state = Closing;
     t4 := event = buttonOrObstacle & state = Closed;
     t5 := event = buttonOrObstacle & state = Opening;
     t6 := event = reachTop & state = Opening;
     t7 := event = buttonOrObstacle & state = HalfOpen;
  
    -- This part defines the transitions from states to states for the given NuSMV module --
   ASSIGN
     init( state ) := Open;
     next( state ) := case
       t6 : Open;
       t1 : Closing;
       t3 : Closed;
       t4 | t2 | t7 : Opening;
       t5 : HalfOpen;
       TRUE : state;
     esac;
 
    
 -- This defines a NuSMV module for main --
 MODULE main

    -- This part declares state variables for the given NuSMV module --
   VAR
     status : Status;
    
   CTLSPEC   EF  ( status.state = Open )
   CTLSPEC   EF  ( status.state = Closing )
   CTLSPEC   EF  ( status.state = Closed )
   CTLSPEC   EF  ( status.state = Opening )
   CTLSPEC   EF  ( status.state = HalfOpen )
